data.text: @Roofershound Wow wee! I wonder if this makes the headlines?!
@Roofershound Can u imagine seeing this & knowing u let ur kids have it 🙄
@Lageraemia We’ll done for not offering it to kids 😉

@Roofershound The question I have now is why we are so keen to use a vaccine that doesn’t really have the key to fit the ‘lock’ of the circulating omicron variant. We’re not offering to do kids but not because it’s dangerous though.

@Roofershound Side effect lists NEVER make sense for any medicine. Constipation AND diarrhoea are on most lists because it’s anything that’s ever happened to anyone in a trial, whether it’s the drug or not.

@Lageraemia Why have they listed it then?
Doesn’t make sense if they aren’t connected
